document.masterDocTitle: A catalog of Rhagionidae (Diptera: Brachycera) from Chile

subSubSection.paragraph: atrifemur Malloch, 1932a: 210 .

Holotype : male, Casa Pangue, Chile (NHMUK). Dist.: Región de Los Lagos , Llanquihue Province (Casa Pangue). Refs.: Stuardo, 1946: 76 (cat.); James, 1975: 1 (cat., as Xylophagidae ); Kerr, 2010: 124 (list).

Syntypes : sex unknown, Corral , Chile ( MNNC , presumed lost). Dist.: Región de Los Ríos , Valdivia Province (Corral); Región de Los Lagos , Chiloé Province (Puntra)
.
edwardsi Malloch, 1932a: 212–213 .

paragraph.materialsCitation: Holotype : male, Puerto Montt , Chile ( NHMUK ). Dist.: Región de Los Lagos , Llanquihue Province (Puerto Montt), Chiloé Province (Ancud).

subSubSection.paragraph: Coscarón, 2005: 364 (list, as Xylophagidae ); Kerr, 2010: 124 (list). fusca Malloch, 1932a: 213 . Holotype : male, Puntra, Chiloé, Chile (NHMUK). Dist.: Región de Los Lagos , Chiloé Province (Ancud, Puntra). Refs.: Malloch, 1932a: 208 (key), Stuardo, 1946: 76 (cat.); James, 1975: 2 (cat., as Xylophagidae ); González &
fuscicoxa Malloch, 1932a: 215–216 .

paragraph.materialsCitation: Holotype : female, Casa Pangue , Chile ( NHMUK ). Dist.: Región de Los Lagos , Llanquihue Province (Casa Pangue, Puerto Varas).

subSubSection.paragraph: Refs.: Malloch, 1932a: 208 (key), Stuardo, 1946: 76 (cat.); James, 1975: 2 (cat., as Xylophagidae ); Kerr, 2010: 124 (list).

Syntypes : sex unknown, San Juan , Chile ( MNNC , presumed lost); Dist.: Región de Los Ríos , Ranco Province (San Juan)
.
Comments. Malloch (1932a: 214 , footnote) cites a male specimen deposited in J. Bigot Collection and it may be a syntype .
Holotype : male, Chile ( UMO ). Dist.: (without precise locality).
imitans Malloch, 1932a: 211–212 .
